basic.blooming: Succulent plant, open orange red flower in late summer
basic.color: Leaf color yellow green，and leaf apex will turn red with sufficient sunlight

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sunlight, avoid strong direct sunlight in summer
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
